resolution.description: The problem described is an issue which will never be fixed.
resolution.name: Won't Fix

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Runtime
components.description: Generic bucket for uncategorized runtime issues

fields.description: Currently the column names for a SQL migration go through normalization at runtime in the sql.js sync adapter in the {{SQLiteMigrateDB()}} function. We should find a way to do this normalization at compile time to improve performance.
fields.summary: Process SQL migration column names at compile time

comments.body: This would require using AST parsing on the model since it is javascript, not JSONm which would lengthen the compile process. Since no one has ever noted the normalization as a performance issue, and it is totally avoidable with proper type naming, I am closing this ticket.
